name: Rock 'em Sock 'em Mechas
description:
Game I made for MechaJamIII! I only made it in a few days because I had issues getting myself going, but it's the first full thing I've made in Godot which I'm happy about. I also thought the jam ended Sunday and didn't realize it ended tonight (Fiday).... so the music and announcer voice needed to be done within the last hour and a half of the dev period lol. More of a toy really but I like it.

Did everything myself except for the font which is the 3Dventure font by memesbruh03 on dafont.com

I'll add punching sounds and more animations for heads exploding at the end as well, after the ranking period of the jam.

P1 Controls: A + D

P2 Controls: left + right arrow keys

Press space to restart the match.

Press enter during the countdown to toggle on or off two player
